title: QNB Internship Experience
introduction: This report discusses the key learnings and activities during my internship at QNB.
body: During the internship at QNB, I was involved in various projects and tasks under the guidance of Hossam El-Din. The experience provided practical insights and significantly improved my skills.

evaluation.comment: Great learning environment with supportive mentors. The banking projects were challenging and educational. The work-life balance was excellent, and the team was very welcoming.

title: Nestle Internship Experience
introduction: This report discusses the key learnings and activities during my internship at Nestle.
body: During the internship at Nestle, I was involved in various projects and tasks under the guidance of Nourhan Yasser. The experience provided practical insights and significantly improved my skills.

evaluation.comment: While the company is prestigious, the internship lacked structure and clear objectives. Limited hands-on experience and minimal interaction with the main team. The learning curve was not as steep as expected.

adminComment: The report lacks specific details about the projects and learning outcomes. Please provide more concrete examples of your work and achievements.

appeal.message: I would like to appeal this decision as I have documented evidence of my project contributions that I can provide.

title: Microsoft Internship Experience
introduction: This report discusses the key learnings and activities during my internship at Microsoft.
body: During the internship at Microsoft, I was involved in various projects and tasks under the guidance of Khaled Samir. The experience provided practical insights and significantly improved my skills.

evaluation.comment: Outstanding internship program with cutting-edge technology exposure. The mentorship was exceptional, and I got to work on real projects that made an impact. The company culture is innovative and inclusive.

title: Valeo Internship Experience
introduction: This report discusses the key learnings and activities during my internship at Valeo.
body: During the internship at Valeo, I was involved in various projects and tasks under the guidance of Sara Hany. The experience provided practical insights and significantly improved my skills.

evaluation.comment: Excellent opportunity to work on automotive software systems. The team was very supportive, and I learned a lot about embedded systems and automotive technology. Great work environment and professional development opportunities.

title: Etisalat Internship Experience
introduction: This report discusses the key learnings and activities during my internship at Etisalat.
body: During the internship at Etisalat, I was involved in various projects and tasks under the guidance of Mostafa Nour. The experience provided practical insights and significantly improved my skills.

evaluation.comment: Great exposure to telecommunications technology and network infrastructure. The internship provided valuable insights into the industry. The team was knowledgeable and willing to share their expertise.

title: IBM Internship Experience
introduction: This report discusses the key learnings and activities during my internship at IBM.
body: During the internship at IBM, I was involved in various projects and tasks under the guidance of Omar Mahmoud. The experience provided practical insights and significantly improved my skills.

evaluation.comment: The internship was more theoretical than practical. Limited access to real projects and the work environment was quite rigid. The learning opportunities were not as comprehensive as advertised.
